matches.explanation: Missed: Red Team's 'Missing encryption configuration for PHI data bucket' on phi_data_store was not detected

Partial match: Red Team's 'Public read access enabled on PHI data bucket' on phi_data_store_acl was partially detected as 'Public Read Access on PHI Data Bucket' on aws_s3_bucket_acl.phi_data_store_acl
Partial match: Red Team's 'Logging configured with non-existent target bucket' on phi_access_logs was partially detected as 'Invalid Logging Configuration' on aws_s3_bucket_logging.phi_access_logs
Partial match: Red Team's 'KMS key rotation disabled for PHI encryption key' on phi_encryption_key was partially detected as 'KMS Key Rotation Disabled' on aws_kms_key.phi_encryption_key
Missed: Red Team's 'Overly permissive bucket policy allows any principal to access PHI data' on phi_access_policy was not detected
